name: Jungle Ninja - For Kids! Swing, Tumbling Beyond the Empire Frontier Adventure!!
name_original: Jungle Ninja - For Kids! Swing, Tumbling Beyond the Empire Frontier Adventure!!
description:
■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□
» Full version! » No adverts! » No In App Purchases!
■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□
You have escaped the Empire Of The Sun and need to get as far as you can through the jungle!

Tilt to swing further! See the ninja nearly fly apart as he whips through the air on his vine but don't let him hit the ground or it's all over!

Get as far as you can by grabbing a passing bird! But watch out - sometimes the birds are just going to fly you back to the start!

Only got 30 seconds? Pick the 30 game and see how far you get! Got a minute? There you go! Got lots of time on your hands? Check out the Shop for unlimited time to play! Plus more jungles funky jungles!

» Beautiful graphics!
» Cooool sounds!
» Different jungles!
» Different ropes!
» Tilting fun!!!
